verses.verse: But a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G367>Ananias,<s%> with <S%G4551>Sapphira<s%> his <S%G1135>wife,<s%> <S%G4453>sold<s%> a <S%G2933>possession,<s%>

And <S%G3557>kept<s%> <S%G3557>back<s%> part of the <S%G5092>price,<s%> his <S%G1135>wife<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> being <S%G4894>privy<s%> to it, and <S%G5342>brought<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G3313>part,<s%> and <S%G5087>laid<s%> it <S%G3844>at<s%> the <S%G652>apostles'<s%> <S%G4228>feet.<s%>

But <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G367>Ananias,<s%> <S%G1302>why<s%> has <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G4137>filled<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> to <S%G5574>lie<s%> to the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost,<s%> and to <S%G3557>keep<s%> <S%G3557>back<s%> part of the <S%G5092>price<s%> of the <S%G5564>land?<s%>

Whiles it <S%G3306>remained,<s%> was it not <S%G4671>your<s%> own? and after it was <S%G4097>sold,<s%> was it not in <S%G3588>your<s%> <S%G4674><s%> own <S%G1849>power?<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> have you <S%G5087>conceived<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G4229>thing<s%> in <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2588>heart?<s%> you have not <S%G5574>lied<s%> to <S%G444>men,<s%> but to <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And <S%G367>Ananias<s%> <S%G191>hearing<s%> <S%G5128>these<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> down, and gave up the <S%G1634>ghost:<s%> and <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> them that <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things.
And the <S%G3501>young<s%> men <S%G450>arose,<s%> <S%G4958>wound<s%> him up, and <S%G1627>carried<s%> him out, and <S%G2290>buried<s%> him.

And it was <S%G5613>about<s%> the <S%G1292>space<s%> of <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G5610>hours<s%> after, when his <S%G1135>wife,<s%> not <S%G1492>knowing<s%> <S%G3588>what<s%> was <S%G1096>done,<s%> <S%G1525>came<s%> in.

And <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> to her, <S%G2036>Tell<s%> me <S%G1487>whether<s%> you <S%G591>sold<s%> the <S%G5564>land<s%> for <S%G5118>so<s%> <S%G5118>much?<s%> And she <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G3483>Yes,<s%> for <S%G5118>so<s%> <S%G5118>much.<s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to her, <S%G5101>How<s%> is it that you have <S%G4856>agreed<s%> <S%G4856>together<s%> to <S%G3985>tempt<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord?<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> the <S%G4228>feet<s%> of them which have <S%G2290>buried<s%> your <S%G435>husband<s%> are <S%G1909>at<s%> the <S%G2374>door,<s%> and shall <S%G1627>carry<s%> you out.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> she down <S%G3916>straightway<s%> <S%G3844>at<s%> his <S%G4228>feet,<s%> and <S%G1634>yielded<s%> up the <S%G1634>ghost:<s%> and the <S%G3495>young<s%> <S%G3495>men<s%> <S%G1525>came<s%> in, and <S%G2147>found<s%> her <S%G3498>dead,<s%> and, <S%G1627>carrying<s%> her <S%G1627>forth,<s%> <S%G2290>buried<s%> her by her <S%G435>husband.<s%>
And <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> on <S%G3650>all<s%> the <S%G1577>church,<s%> and on as many as <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things.

And by the <S%G5495>hands<s%> of the <S%G652>apostles<s%> were <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%> and <S%G5059>wonders<s%> <S%G1096>worked<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G2992>people;<s%> (and they were <S%G537>all<s%> with <S%G3661>one<s%> <S%G3661>accord<s%> in <S%G4672>Solomon's<s%> <S%G4745>porch.<s%>
And of the <S%G3062>rest<s%> <S%G5111>dared<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G2853>join<s%> himself to them: but the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G3170>magnified<s%> them.
And <S%G4100>believers<s%> were the <S%G3123>more<s%> <S%G4369>added<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G4128>multitudes<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> of <S%G435>men<s%> and <S%G1135>women.<s%>)

<S%G5620>So<s%> that they <S%G1627>brought<s%> <S%G1627>forth<s%> the <S%G772>sick<s%> <S%G2596>into<s%> the <S%G4113>streets,<s%> and <S%G5087>laid<s%> them <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G2825>beds<s%> and <S%G2895>couches,<s%> that <S%G2579>at<s%> the <S%G2579>least<s%> the <S%G4639>shadow<s%> of <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G2064>passing<s%> by might <S%G1982>overshadow<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> of them.

There <S%G4905>came<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> a <S%G4128>multitude<s%> out of the <S%G4172>cities<s%> <S%G4038>round<s%> <S%G4038>about<s%> to <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G5342>bringing<s%> <S%G772>sick<s%> folks, and them which were <S%G3791>vexed<s%> with <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirits:<s%> and they were <S%G2323>healed<s%> <S%G537>every<s%> one.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest<s%> <S%G450>rose<s%> up, and <S%G3956>all<s%> they that were with him, <S%G3588>(which<s%> is the <S%G139>sect<s%> of the <S%G4523>Sadducees,<s%>) and were <S%G4137>filled<s%> with <S%G2205>indignation,<s%>
And <S%G1911>laid<s%> their <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G652>apostles,<s%> and <S%G5087>put<s%> them in the <S%G1219>common<s%> <S%G5084>prison.<s%>

But the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> by <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G455>opened<s%> the <S%G5438>prison<s%> <S%G2374>doors,<s%> and <S%G1806>brought<s%> them <S%G1806>forth,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%>
<S%G4198>Go,<s%> <S%G2476>stand<s%> and <S%G2980>speak<s%> in the <S%G2411>temple<s%> to the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4487>words<s%> of <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%>

And when they <S%G191>heard<s%> that, they <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2411>temple<s%> <S%G3722>early<s%> in the morning, and <S%G1321>taught.<s%> But the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest<s%> <S%G3854>came,<s%> and they that were with him, and <S%G4779>called<s%> the <S%G4892>council<s%> <S%G4779>together,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1087>senate<s%> of the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel,<s%> and <S%G649>sent<s%> to the <S%G1201>prison<s%> to have them <S%G71>brought.<s%>
But when the <S%G5257>officers<s%> <S%G3854>came,<s%> and <S%G2147>found<s%> them not in the <S%G5438>prison,<s%> they returned <S%G390><s%>and <S%G518>told,<s%>

<S%G3004>Saying,<s%> The <S%G1201>prison<s%> <S%G3303>truly<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> we <S%G2808>shut<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G803>safety,<s%> and the <S%G5441>keepers<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G1854>without<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G2374>doors:<s%> but when we had <S%G455>opened,<s%> we <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G2080>within.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> the <S%G2409>high<s%> <S%G749>priest<s%> and the <S%G4755>captain<s%> of the <S%G2411>temple<s%> and the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G5128>these<s%> <S%G3056>things,<s%> they <S%G1280>doubted<s%> of them <S%G5101>whereunto<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> would <S%G1096>grow.<s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G3854>came<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> and <S%G518>told<s%> them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> the <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> you <S%G5087>put<s%> in <S%G5438>prison<s%> are <S%G2476>standing<s%> in the <S%G2411>temple,<s%> and <S%G1321>teaching<s%> the <S%G2992>people.<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G565>went<s%> the <S%G4755>captain<s%> with the <S%G5257>officers,<s%> and <S%G71>brought<s%> them <S%G3756>without<s%> <S%G3326><s%> <S%G970>violence:<s%> for they <S%G5399>feared<s%> the <S%G2992>people,<s%> <S%G2443>lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> they should have been <S%G3034>stoned.<s%>
And when they had <S%G71>brought<s%> them, they <S%G2476>set<s%> them <S%G1722>before<s%> the <S%G4892>council:<s%> and the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> them,

<S%G3004>Saying,<s%> Did not we straightly <S%G3853>command<s%> you that you should not <S%G1321>teach<s%> in <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G3686>name?<s%> and, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> you have <S%G4137>filled<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> with <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1322>doctrine,<s%> and <S%G1014>intend<s%> to <S%G1863>bring<s%> <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G444>man's<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> on us.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> and the other <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> We <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G3980>obey<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> <S%G444>men.<s%>
The <S%G2316>God<s%> of our <S%G3962>fathers<s%> <S%G1453>raised<s%> up <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> you <S%G1315>slew<s%> and <S%G2910>hanged<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> a <S%G3586>tree.<s%>

Him has <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5312>exalted<s%> with his <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%> to be a <S%G747>Prince<s%> and a <S%G4990>Savior,<s%> for to <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G3341>repentance<s%> to <S%G2474>Israel,<s%> and <S%G859>forgiveness<s%> of <S%G266>sins.<s%>

And we are his <S%G3144>witnesses<s%> of <S%G5130>these<s%> <S%G4487>things;<s%> and so is <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G1325>given<s%> to them that <S%G3980>obey<s%> him.
When they <S%G191>heard<s%> that, they were <S%G1282>cut<s%> to the <S%G2588>heart,<s%> and <S%G1011>took<s%> <S%G1011>counsel<s%> to <S%G337>slay<s%> them.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G450>stood<s%> there up <S%G5100>one<s%> in the <S%G4892>council,<s%> a <S%G5330>Pharisee,<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G1059>Gamaliel,<s%> a <S%G3547>doctor<s%> of the <S%G3547>law,<s%> had in <S%G5093>reputation<s%> among <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people,<s%> and <S%G2753>commanded<s%> to <S%G4160>put<s%> the <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G1854>forth<s%> a <S%G1024>little<s%> <S%G1024>space;<s%>

And <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, You <S%G435>men<s%> of <S%G2475>Israel,<s%> take <S%G4337>heed<s%> to <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> you <S%G3195>intend<s%> to <S%G4238>do<s%> as <S%G1909>touching<s%> <S%G5125>these<s%> <S%G444>men.<s%>

For <S%G4253>before<s%> <S%G5130>these<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G450>rose<s%> up <S%G2333>Theudas,<s%> <S%G3004>boasting<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> to be <S%G5100>somebody;<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> a <S%G706>number<s%> of <S%G435>men,<s%> <S%G5616>about<s%> <S%G5071>four<s%> <S%G5071>hundred,<s%> <S%G4347>joined<s%> themselves: <S%G3739>who<s%> was <S%G337>slain;<s%> and <S%G3956>all,<s%> as <S%G3745>many<s%> as <S%G3982>obeyed<s%> him, were <S%G1262>scattered,<s%> and <S%G1096>brought<s%> to <S%G3762>nothing.<s%>

<S%G3326>After<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> man <S%G450>rose<s%> up <S%G2455>Judas<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee<s%> in the <S%G2250>days<s%> of the <S%G583>taxing,<s%> and <S%G868>drew<s%> <S%G868>away<s%> <S%G2425>much<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> him: he <S%G2548>also<s%> <S%G622>perished;<s%> and <S%G3956>all,<s%> even as <S%G3745>many<s%> as <S%G3982>obeyed<s%> him, were <S%G1287>dispersed.<s%>

And <S%G3568>now<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G868>Refrain<s%> from <S%G5130>these<s%> <S%G444>men,<s%> and <S%G1439>let<s%> them <S%G1439>alone:<s%> for <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G1012>counsel<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> be of <S%G444>men,<s%> it will <S%G2647>come<s%> to <S%G2647>nothing:<s%>

But <S%G1487>if<s%> it be of <S%G2316>God,<s%> you <S%G3756>cannot<s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G2647>overthrow<s%> it; <S%G3379>lest<s%> <S%G3379>haply<s%> you be <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> to <S%G2314>fight<s%> against <S%G2314>God.<s%>

And to him they <S%G3982>agreed:<s%> and when they had <S%G4341>called<s%> the <S%G652>apostles,<s%> and <S%G1194>beaten<s%> them, they <S%G3853>commanded<s%> that they should not <S%G2980>speak<s%> in the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and <S%G630>let<s%> them <S%G630>go.<s%>

And they <S%G4198>departed<s%> from the <S%G4383>presence<s%> of the <S%G4892>council,<s%> <S%G5463>rejoicing<s%> that they were <S%G2661>counted<s%> <S%G2661>worthy<s%> to <S%G818>suffer<s%> <S%G818>shame<s%> for his <S%G3686>name.<s%>

And <S%G3956>daily<s%> <S%G2250><s%> in the <S%G2411>temple,<s%> and in <S%G2596>every<s%> <S%G3624>house,<s%> they <S%G3973>ceased<s%> not to <S%G1321>teach<s%> and <S%G2097>preach<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
